name: Troll Face
description: Trollface is the oldest meme and most memorable memecoin in existence that pays homage to the world's oldest and most beloved meme. With its iconic and recognizable face, Trollface has captured the hearts of internet users for years. As the most popular meme in history, Trollface holds immense cultural significance and represents the essence of humor, satire, and internet culture. Trollface emerges at a pivotal moment in the cryptocurrency landscape, where meme-based tokens have gained tremendous popularity. However, many of these derivative tokens lack originality and long-term value. Trollface aims to change the game by reclaiming the memecoin space and showcasing the true potential of a meme-driven cryptocurrency.
